name: zunpulse
0:
”Alexa, switch off lamp.”
”Alexa, switch on lamp.”
”Alexa, change lamp color to red.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you own zunpulse smart lights and smart plugs added to your account on the zunpulse app, you may now control them using voice commands to Alexa. 

All you need to do is to open the Alexa app and ask Alexa to link your zunpulse account to Alexa and then ask Alexa to control any of your zunpulse smart devices using voice commands using the device name. 

If your smart device is named "lamp" you can now say - 
- Alexa, turn on/off lamp
- Alexa, change lamp colour to red (works for smart lights)
- Alexa, turn on/off all lights

Please note that the device can be given any name of your choice - so if you name a smart plug as "heater" in the zunpulse app and connect a simple room heater to it, you can ask Alexa to turn on "heater" and that will then turn on the smart plug and the connected room heater at the default settings of that room heater

This skill enables you to control all your zunpulse smart devices that are already added to your zunpulse account on the zunpulse app. If the device you want to control is not added to your zunpulse account, please use the zunpulse app to add it first or use an existing device name and try again. You will get a similar response message from Alexa when you try to control a device not added to your zunpulse account

About the zunpulse app:
The zunpulse app and zunpulse smart devices are a one stop solution for your smart home automation needs. Made in India, this highly customizable user interface provides you with the comfort, convenience and performance you always needed. You may download zunpulse using App store for iOS devices and Play Store for android devices
